welcome_message: Welcome to the Nova Forms demo. In this demo, we show you how easy it is to use Nova Forms compared to other alternatives. Sit back and enjoy!
about_yourself_message: Please fill out the form below with your personal information.
repeatable_information_message: This demonstrates the ability to dynamically add and remove components, or have repeatable components
uploading_files_message: Support for file upload can be easily added by inserting the respective component. The server side handling is generated automatically.
pdf_rendering_note: Also note that this part of the form won't be rendered in the output PDF. On the other hand, the output PDF can contain sections that are not shown here.
check_form_preview_message: Please check the preview of your form by clicking the preview button on the bottom right.
submit_message: After you have confirmed that everything looks alright, you can click submit button send the data to the server and generate the final PDF.
datatypes_message: The following datatypes are supported so far, with full validation.
server_fn_message: The address field below supports autocompletion by calling a server function, that again cals the Swiss Post API to fetch the city name by ZIP Code.
submit_error: Your form could not be submitted, please try again later.
csr_only_messge: Please note that this form currently runs in client-side only mode. This means that certain features such as file upload, prefilling and form submission are disabled. You can run this form in full mode by downloading the repository and hosting it locally on your computer.
dynamic_dialog_message: Here we show that it's also possible to have interactions between compontents.
error_emails_not_equal: The provided emails are not the same.

field_message: Each input field directly maps to a type. Depending on the type, the input field type and validation changes.
